Subject: Brotherhood Strikes Like a Rattlesnake
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:




A inner monlogue comm. transmission was sent to Vehement from a certain 
supposed diety.  He had given the order to attack, and that is what was going 
to happen.

Still flying forward at full speed, the sixteen foot high robot raised both 
hands, palms outstretched.  Firing from the palms were invisible blasts of 
destructive sonic energy at the CF.

---

Sun Crusher raised a left arm, the top of his wrist extening upward to reveal 
a large barrel.  A grenade launched from his wrist, heading for the CF and 
set to explode on impact.

---

"DIE HEATHEN SCUM!" Reflector screamed into his comm. unit, the transmission 
going to all Maximal frequencies.

From subspace a missile launcher appeared in the smallest of the Brotherhood 
members' arms, two missiles erupting from its large barrel.  Reflector patted 
the side of his rapid-firing missile launcher, but knew he couldn't keep it 
up or he'd use all his missiles.  He simply watched with a giddy feeling as 
his two missiles headed for the CF.
